All Classes

Class Description
AbstractTurn
This class is responsible for the sequence in which actions can be performed by a given Divinity.
Apollo
This class is the implementation of the divinity Apollo.
Ares
This class is the implementation of the divinity Ares.
Artemis
This class is the implementation of the divinity Artemis.
Athena
This class is the implementation of the divinity Athena.
Atlas
This class is the implementation of the divinity Atlas.
Block
Class that represents a block at any level.
Board
Class representing the board of the game.
Charon
This class is the implementation of the divinity Charon.
DefaultTurn
Implementation of AbstractTurn used by all Divinities that have a turn strictly composed only of a move action followed by a build action.
DefeatChecker
This class is responsible for checking whether a player has lost or not.
Demeter
This class is the implementation of the divinity Demeter.
Divinity
This class provides default behaviour for all actions a divinity cards share, but doesn't specify the order in which they can be taken.
DivinityFactory
Factory class for all divinities: no divinity should call its constructor explicitly, this class is used for creation of instances of new divinities.
DivinityMediator
Class that handles all god powers that influence other players' turns.
DivinityMediatorDecorator
The presence of divinities that affect other players' turns requires a way for Divinities to be "consulted" outside of their turn.
Dome
Class that represents a dome at any level.
GameDirector  
Hephaestus
This class is the implementation of the divinity Hephaestus.
Hera
This class is the implementation of the divinity Hera.
Hestia
This class is the implementation of the divinity Hestia.
Limus
This class is the implementation of the divinity Limus.
Minotaur
This class is the implementation of the divinity Minotaur.
Pan
This class is the implementation of the divinity Pan.
Piece
Marker interface to allow Blocks, Domes and Workers to be treated equally by certain methods.
Player
Class representing each player.
Prometheus
This class is the implementation of the divinity Prometheus.
SentinelDecorator
Decorator used to allow dynamic decoration of the DivinityMediator.
Square
This class represents one of the 25 spaces that the Board is made of.
TurnTick
Class responsible for handling each Player's turn.
UInterface
Allows interface between user and game
Winner
Class used to handle victory.
Worker
Class representing workers.
